label: Doug — 2 Feb — Pinged Andy in #general with the SLT prep reminder.

Current time: Sunday, February 1st, 2026 — 7:12 PM (America/New_York)

turns.thinking:
This is a cron job firing to remind Andy about SLT prep. I need to send a message to Andy on Discord. Let me use the message tool to send this reminder.

From memory, Andy's Discord ID is 330621384021508097. I should send him a direct message with the reminder.

args.message: Hey Andy! 🔬 Reminder: time to start SLT prep!

turns.thinking:
The direct message didn't work. Let me try a different approach - maybe I need to use a different channel format or the channel parameter. Let me check what options I have.

Actually, looking at the message tool parameters, I should probably specify the channel as "discord" explicitly. Let me try that.

args.message: Hey Andy! 🔬 Reminder: time to start SLT prep!

turns.thinking:
Still getting "Unknown Channel". This might be because:
1. The Discord bot can't DM users directly
2. I need to use a different target format
3. There might be a specific channel I need to use

Let me try getting more info about available channels.
Need a guild ID. From memory, the Discord server ID is 1467519191346053203. Let me list channels there and find a good place to ping Andy.
